meta.@content: A Seamless VRML Human, demonstrating the HAnim 2001 Specification, animation scripting via an external prototype (ExternProtoDeclare).
Skin mesh is split across multiple shapes within a Group, should that be allowed?
What does the original animation script accomplish? It is not hooked up, script source contains errors...
InstantReality Forum Issue: InstantReality is ignoring the Viewpoint nodes in the topmost HAnimSite. http://forum.instantreality.org

@info: Blaxxun compatibility by Tu Lam - TuL@seamless-solutions.com

-children.#comment: When converting to VRML97 (which didn't include HAnim), HAnim node prototypes are provided automatically by the X3dToVrml97.xslt translation stylesheet
